reviews.review:
You're not smart.
You're not a scientist.
You're not a doctor.
You're not even a full-time employee.
Where did your life go so wrong?

I liked Portal better than Portal 2 which gets all the love.

Portal is shorter, more challenging, and without the colored goo from Portal 2.

It's a bit short on character, but as a pure puzzle game it's the better game.
A Classic Need I say more
玩到了16关，困住我的不是看似无边无际的机枪海，而是比机枪海还要令人难受的卡顿……

Сложная головоломка с неповторимым сюжетом, интересными картами и прикольными нпс(НЕ ТРОГАЙ МЕНЯ!). Думать приходилось на протяжении всего времени, что я играл, а некоторые головоломки я прошел только благодаря youtube, потому что очень уж сложно иногда бывало. Но игрой остался доволен.
Шикарная игра для любителей головоломок с порталами и интересного сюжета. В ней вам предстоит за испытуемую пройти множество тестовых камер ради тортика. Или же нет?
Центр вновь напоминает вам, что вы - торт
Игра очень прикольная жаль что маленькая

za dzieciaka grałem u kuzyna, potem u siebie. bawiłem się świetnie w 1 i 2 :)
polecam
I enjoy all the portal games

It's a masterpiece, you won't regret playing.

Just play it.
Es muy bueno, buenísimo. Las mecánicas son muy originales y es muy cómodo. Se nota que está bien desarrollado. Solo desearía que fuera más largo (me lo pasé en una tarde, literal XDD).

Game is so old you should really only get it if it's on sale. It's fun and confusing. If you're having problems solving the puzzles then you probably need to take a break. None of the puzzles are hard per se, but they will have you sitting and staring occasionally. It's only a few hours long, but still a memorable experience. yea
힘들었지만 still alive를 듣는 순간 다 풀림

昨晚花了2个小时通关了，v社的游戏就是棒。这是我第一次在3D游戏中体验到传送门的概念，第一关上来还懵了好一会才想明白怎么回事。虽然好玩，但晕3D的玩家们可能会有点受不了。

真是一次非常棒的全新体验！总之推荐！
best game ever is probably on sale
Always a classic, played this on my dad's computer once and loved it, I now own it for myself and still have fun playing it.
прошел за 2 часа классная игра всем советую

Steamチュートリアル。L4D、L4D2、Portal、Portal2はもはや鉄板。1のストーリーは薄味だけどしっかり日本語化されているのと独特の言い回しは必見。要求スペックが低いためSteamの試運転にも。
あとGLaDosがかわいい。あとGLaDosがかわいい。
very fun if u like puzzle games with a final level that really tests your patience
muy corto muy facil es piola lo recomiendo

킬링 타임용으로 괜찮은 게임. 
그런데 3D 멀미 심하신 분들은 장시간 플레이는 힘들 것 같음.
This is the BEST game I've ever played.
Super awesome gameplay for an extremely
Melhor jogo de puzzle em primeira pessoa, sendo muito inovador ao seu tempo
Even though it is old I believed it has aged well and is enjoyable even today. Pleaseplay!!
It was fast and wasn't too hard, though there's other stuff to do once you beat the game and on sale it's 2$ anyways so it's worth it
O jogo é muito divertido. Algumas poucas fases te fazem realmente quebrar a cabeça, mas no geral é fácil. A campanha principal se termina em menos de 4 horas.
I thought it was longer, anyhoo, great game, and hoping that portal 2 is longer
Epic. But it gets boring after a single playthrough. 8/10
Bought the game, beaten it in 55 minutes, never playing it again lol

Pohodová hra na zamyšlení a trochu logického myšlení. Nenáročné ovládání, ideální na gamepad - ale dobrá i s myší a klávesnicí.

■■□□□ Délka hraní 
■■■□□ Obtížnost 
■■□□□ Příběh 
■■■□□ Grafika
ja to com o cu doendo de tanto ficar sentado jogando
jogo simplesmente incrivel, de fato é um jogo antigo mas é muito bom, recomndo
Simple at first but does get a little challenging once you learn the mechanics. One of the best puzzle games ever created!
Игра не плохая порой и до сей день. Испытания действительно бывают сложные, иногда даже требуют ловкости. Рекомендую поиграть.
The coolest puzzle game I ever played. Mind-blowing

할인할 때 번들로 사서 2.7시간만에 엔딩 봤습니다.

10.500이라는 가격대비 플레이타임은 아쉬운 편이나 내용이 굉장히 알찹니다. 딱 옛날 과자들처럼요.

엿같은 실험실 안에서 과학밖에 모르는 글라도스 눈나와 멍청한 터렛들과 함께 데이트를 즐기고 싶다면 한번쯤 구매하시는 걸 추천드립니다. 솔직히 글라도스 눈나 아니면 어떤 여자가 우리에게 말을 걸어주겠습니까!

선넘지 말라구요? 알았어요.
Very good, classic game. A bit shorter than I expected, but still proved to be challenging in some areas (in a good way).

This was a triumph!
I'm making a note here:
Huge success!

It's hard to overstate
my satisfaction.

Aperture Science:
We do what we must
because we can
For the good of all of us.
Except the ones who are dead.

But there's no sense crying
over every mistake.
You just keep on trying
'til you run out of cake.
And the science gets done.
And you make a neat gun
for the people who are
still alive.

I'm not even angry...
I'm being so sincere right now.
Even though you broke my heart,
and killed me.

And tore me to pieces.
And threw every piece into a fire.
As they burned it hurt because
I was so happy for you!

Now, these points of data
make a beautiful line.
And we're out of beta.
We're releasing on time!
So I'm GLaD I got burned!
Think of all the things we learned!
for the people who are
still alive.

Go ahead and leave me...
I think I'd prefer to stay inside...
Maybe you'll find someone else
to help you.
Maybe Black Mesa?
That was a joke. Ha Ha. Fat Chance!

Anyway this cake is great!
It's so delicious and moist!

Look at me: still talking
when there's science to do!
When I look out there,
it makes me glad I'm not you.

I've experiments to run.
There is research to be done.
On the people who are
still alive.
And believe me I am
still alive.
I'm doing science and I'm
still alive.
I feel fantastic and I'm
still alive.
While you're dying I'll be
still alive.
And when you're dead I will be
still alive

Still alive.

Still alive.

Just as Valve's Half-Life 2 is the moody loner to Halo 3's high-school quarterback, Portal is smarter, cooler, funnier, and more sinister than almost any game this year. From beginning to end, it's hard to find something not to like about Portal. Everything from the gameplay to the presentation are top-notch. Skilled players will portal their way through the nineteen levels in just a few hours, but this little puzzle game / tech demo provides plenty of entertainment and makes a great addition to The Orange Box.

Aunque se te puede hacer un juego corto, es según el nivel del jugador, pues podrás salvar los niveles más rápido o no. Sí lo recomendaría, pues te engancha de principio a fin ;D Teniendo además desafíos y logros que te añadirán más dificultad y horas a este juego.
Очень хорошая игра, хоть она и старая, но выглядит свежо и сейчас. Нашёл всего один минус- продолжительность прошёл всего за 3 часа. 8/10

very good, lots of portals
get it

I love these types of games that combine FPS with a puzzle. Not only fun to play, but also to solve.

Including a chocolate cake.

This is probably the best game I've ever played!  The puzzles continue to grow and change so that it's not repetitive, and the story itself is well thought out.  I've played through this and Portal 2 quite a few times, and have had loads of fun every time!
Before I played this game I had 3 IQ. After playing this game I still have 3 IQ, but the game is f***** awesome
Шикарная игра, Шикарный сиквел, Шикарные головоломки и бонусные карты
